
gpu_mem=32
dtparam=i2c=on,watchdog=on

dtoverlay=i2c-rtc,mcp7941x

# disable it on Unipi 1.x (gpio24, 25!)
#dtoverlay=spi-neuron,cs2_pin=25,cs3_pin=24
dtoverlay=neuron-spi-new
dtoverlay=neuronee
#dtoverlay=unipiee
#dtoverlay=mcp2515-can0
dtoverlay=ds2482

#remove dependency of spi-clock on system freq
core_freq=250

#BT enabled on RPi3 swaps UART (ttyAMA) and miniUART ttyS0 
dtoverlay=pi3-disable-bt

lcd_rotate=2
